task_description: Add a new Cube::Function variant that evaluates material values dynamically from user-defined expressions. Expressions compile to a shared AST that can target both CPU (fasteval) and GPU (WGSL compute shaders) backends.
completed_work: Phase 1: Core Expression System (CPU) - AST Definition (1.1)
Phase 1: Core Expression System (CPU) - Parser Implementation (1.2)
Phase 1: Core Expression System (CPU) - fasteval Integration (1.3)
Phase 1: Core Expression System (CPU) - CPU Noise Implementation (1.4)
Phase 1: Core Expression System (CPU) - DynamicCube Type (1.5)
Phase 2: GPU Backend (WGSL) - WGSL Code Generator (2.1)
Phase 2: GPU Backend (WGSL) - CPU/GPU Parity Tests (2.5)
pending_work: Phase 2: GPU Backend (WGSL) - GPU Pipeline Setup (2.2)
Phase 2: GPU Backend (WGSL) - Octree Construction from GPU Output (2.3)
Phase 5: Polish and Optimization - Error Handling (5.1)
Phase 5: Polish and Optimization - Performance Optimization (5.2)
